_header: In a frith as I gan fare fremed
_description: The Meeting in the Wood — 48 alliterative lines in 12-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
In a fryht as Y con fare fremedeY founde a wel feyr fenge to
                    fere…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Ych am a maide þat me ofþuncheþLuef me were
                    gome boute gyle
BLHar2253.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.
